description: Application under section 19 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 for variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of listed building consent dated 16/08/2017, ref: PA/17/01925, which gave consent for 'External and internal physical alterations and refurbishment works to Balfron Tower, including: new fenestration; alterations to flat layouts; erection of cornice; replacement of boiler house flues; alterations to car parking, cycle parking and refuse storage arrangements; lighting; hard and soft landscaping and associated works.'The application seeks to make amendments relating to the installation of cross-corridor fire doors into access galleries for fire safety design improvements
site_name: Balfron Tower, 7 St Leonards Road, London
